mapper.insert: insert into user (user_act, user_pwd, user_name, user_email, user_number, user_id_number, user_state, user_power) values (#{user_act}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_number}, #{user_id_number}, #{user_state}, #{user_power})
mapper.update: update user set user_pwd=#{user_pwd} where user_act=#{user_act} and user_email=#{user_email} and user_number=#{user_number} and user_id_number=#{user_id_number}
update user set user_state=#{state} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select user_id from user where user_email = #{user_email}
